issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Seal of a globe with motto DEUS REGNAT EXULTET TERRA (God reigns, let the earth rejoice).
issue_obverse_legend_s: The United States. 60 D | Continental Currency LXD | Sixty Dollars. | This Bill entitles the Bearer to receive Sixty Spanish mill-ed DOLLARS, or the Value thereof in Gold or Silver, ac-cording to a Resolu-tion passed by Con-gress at Philadelphia, Sept. 26th, 1778. LX DOLLARS.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Imitation nature print of a bow.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Sixty DOLLARS. | Printed by Hall & Sellers. 1778.
